snippet: Penn State’s bill to pay costs related to the Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse scandal neared $48 million by the end of May, an increase of $1.9 million from two months earlier.
abstract: Penn State reports that costs related to Jerry Sandusky child abuse scandal have risen to $48 million.
lead_paragraph: Penn State’s bill to pay costs related to the Jerry Sandusky child sex abuse scandal neared $48 million by the end of May, an increase of $1.9 million from two months earlier.

headline.main: Penn State’s Bill Close to $48 Million
